title: AHA! the Alternative Hero Agency
description: free to read at:http://www.mariaandvlasios.comIntroductionWhen the aliens invaded the government sent its finest warriors. But they all failed! So the aliens took the President and demanded the surrender of mankind. Now desperate, the Vice President of the United States decides to visit AHA, a forgotten agency that collects alternative heroes!
